price: So We forgave that for him, and he certainly has a place of nearness to Us and a good place of return.
arabic: فَغَفَرۡنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
